Parameters: int: A status code indicating the type of failure. Value is @B_android#net#wifi#rtt#RangingResultCallback#STATUS_CODE_FAIL_E@, or @B_android#net#wifi#rtt#RangingResultCallback#STATUS_CODE_FAIL_RTT_NOT_AVAILABLE_E@
onRangingFailure(int).Description: Called when a ranging operation failed in whole - i.e. no ranging operation to any of the devices specified in the request was attempted.

Parameters: List: List of range measurements, one per requested device. This value must never be null.
onRangingResults(java.util.List<android..Description: Called when a ranging operation was executed. The list of results corresponds to devices specified in the ranging request.

ClassDesc: Base class for ranging result callbacks. Should be extended by applications and set when calling @B_android#net#wifi#rtt#WifiRttManager#startRanging_E@. If the ranging operation fails in whole (not attempted) then @B_android#net#wifi#rtt#RangingResultCallback#onRangingFailure_E@ will be called with a failure code. If the ranging operation is performed for each of the requested peers then the @B_android#net#wifi#rtt#RangingResultCallback#onRangingResults_E@ will be called with the set of results (@link @B_android#net#wifi#rtt#RangingResult_E@, each of which has its own success/failure code @B_android#net#wifi#rtt#RangingResult#getStatus_E@.
